name: Sniper Fight For Survival
description:
In this shooting game terrorists are hiding out in a building, Hurry up, head shoot all the terrorists now.user sniper rifles,head shots terrorist, do it quickly there is short time to do the job, be a super hero and fight with deadly shooters. As a secret commando and soldier support in combat action against terrorist during the anti-terrorist operation, your job is to protect the city, and shoot all the terrorist to death brutally. Now it’s time to put a counter attack on the terrorist sleeping cells and kill them all an clean city.

Sniper Fight For Survival: Features

Different auto loader Guns
Best Shooting Game
Amazing 3D Graphics
Multiple thrilling missions
Amazing multiple levels
Immersive shooting battlefield environment
Simple and smooth control
Multiple advanced sniping weapons
Best quality attractive background sound effects
Immersive gameplay physics
